data.eml:eml: Revision of " Phyllobrotica " from Taiwan with description of Jolibrotica gen. n. (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng, Bezdek, Jan (2015): Revision of " Phyllobrotica " from Taiwan with description of Jolibrotica gen. n. (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae). ZooKeys 547: 75-92, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.547.9381, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.547.9381
